thread.title: A new Paris Find - Wonderful Staff and Location
thread.title_full: A new Paris Find - Wonderful Staff and Location - Review of Hotel La Tamise - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Martin H
title: A new Paris Find - Wonderful Staff and Location
text:
Location, location, location!
A quiet well run hotel with outstanding staff who go out of their way to accommodate you. Pierre was particularly helpful and prepares a great breakfast. Our compliments to the management on a fine hotel very well located on the Right Bank.
